front.title: RADIUS/1.1, Leveraging ALPN to remove MD5

abstract.t: This document defines Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation Extensions for use with RADIUS/TLS and RADIUS/DTLS. These extensions permit the negotiation of an application protocol variant of RADIUS, called "RADIUS/1.1". No changes are made to RADIUS/UDP or RADIUS/ TCP. The extensions allow the negotiation of a transport profile where the RADIUS shared secret is no longer used, and all MD5-based packet authentication and attribute obfuscation methods are removed. This document updates RFC2865, RFC2866, RFC5176, RFC6613, RFC6614, and RFC 7360.
